column5: Anyone have suggestions on how long the wait is for crossing into Ontario on a Saturday Evening in July? I have always driven up on Friday and crossed at 7-8 PM and never waiting longer than 20 minutes. Something tells me the wait could be a lot longer on Saturdays.
I don't think Sat. evening would be bad-morning, forget it!
I agree....Saturday evening will not be bad. The mornings and even the early afternoons can be real bad, but it is usually cleared out by that time.
